description: Generates a Tabletop Roleplaying Game (TTRPG) encounter outline for a given game system and encounter background.

input_variables.name: game_system
input_variables.description: The TTRPG game system for which the encounter will be designed.

input_variables.name: encounter_background
input_variables.description: Events, locations, NPCs, items and players to consider when designing the encounter.
